snippet: A staff report proposed delaying a decision on adding the renminbi to an international basket of currencies until after September 2016.
lead_paragraph: A staff report proposed delaying a decision on adding the renminbi to an international basket of currencies until after September 2016.

headline.main: I.M.F. Report Recommends Delay in Elevating China's Currency
headline.print_headline: I.M.F. Report Recommends Delay in Elevating China's Currency
